content: So let's play such a decision game, please! I just thought of an element. You should generate the decision tree, and in your response, formulate a question letting me distinguish between three responses, for example denoting them by (1), (2) and (3). I reply to your question, and using that knowledge you continue with the next question, and so on until you learn what element it is! And then you can just say "The answer is", and that element. If you agree, please start right away!
